attributes.action: Free childcare for all working families no matter the age of the child
attributes.additional_details: I am due to go back to work after maternity but can not as my wage doesn't cover childcare costs. Im sure many other parents would return towork if the support was there
attributes.background: Help parents return to work after maternity, not to wait three years and loose all of their experience and earning potential

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105310 

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
